info.name: Jisho 夜明け
info.description: A dark-reddish theme for jisho.org that is intended to be easier on the eyes than their default bright white theme.
info.additionalInfo:
About: This applies a dark reddish theme to every page on jisho.org that I could find. If I missed some element or you found another bug (or have a suggestion) please contact me with it and I'll see what I can do. Made by me (wekateka) using Stylish, tested in the latest stable Firefox. Update history: 26-06-2015: Styled some focused input elements that I missed. 06-12-2015: Styled some more missed elements; Fixed text on Wanikani info overflowing. 21-03-2016: Fixed some buttons having a white background on hover; Made the rectangle containing the "More" link in radical/handwriting view a nicer size. Added support for Jisho classic, and the classic forum. 25-03-2016: Used modified fix from Jisho.org forum user JBRadio to make the custom logo scale on smaller screens. 03-04-2016: Applied more suggestions from forum user JBRadio; Gave the Links span in the search results a hitbox that does not actually stretch over the whole page horizontally. 06-09-2017: Removed white background from 2 buttons in the search bar. Other things:

For chrome users, JBRadio is creating a nice extension for jisho.org that includes this theme (modified for chrome). Check it out here!
